resources.group_description:
You can see all group participants on the map, at the same time they could also see you, if you have enabled option 'Sending my locations'.
You can plan trips, prepare route points and route tracks, you can have live navigation on many devices.
resources.with_osmodroid_description: Our official client gives maximum possibilities to work with service
resources.with_osmand_description: OsmAnd is a powerful navigation program that has a specially designed OsMo plugin. You could use it to communicate with each other, share tracks and use navigational functions.
resources.with_website_description: This is an easy and a simple way to view, monitor and manage group via any convenient internet browser
